content: For the third time, VENUM and UBISOFT are joining forces to celebrate the highly anticipated release of the new instalment, ASSASSIN'S CREED SHADOWS. This unique collaboration will offer fans an exclusive collection that captures the essence and captivating universe of the game. To celebrate the highly anticipated release of Assassin's Creed Shadows, VENUM is collaborating with Ubisoft for the third time to launch an exclusive collection. This collection illustrates the journey and contrasts of the two main heroes, perfectly symbolizing the union of strength and agility, as well as mastery and self-improvement---values shared by both real fighters and the game's characters. The collection consists of three main categories: - PERFORMANCE: This category includes rashguards, boxing shorts, training shorts, and T-shirts designed with dry technology, known for its optimal moisture management. - LIFESTYLE: Featuring comfortable sets designed for everyday wear. - EQUIPMENT: This range offers high-quality boxing gloves and judo kimonos, reflecting the essence of the game. Where to find it? The collection drops on March 17 exclusively on VENUM's official website and with our retail partners. Don't miss out! Grab yours and become an everyday hero.
title: Venum x Assassinâ€™s Creed Shadows : A new Collaboration
